subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON (AP) — “The playoff race is now on,” said Ted Leonsis, the Washington Capitals’ owner and nonstop blogger, in the 10:03 a.m. Friday entry of his Ted’s Take blog.
snippet: WASHINGTON (AP) — “The playoff race is now on,” said Ted Leonsis, the Washington Capitals’ owner and nonstop blogger, in the 10:03 a.m. Friday entry of his Ted’s Take blog.
